name: Bounce and Break
description:
In this Zen world you will play in 4 different universes.

Each universe is divided into 4 seasons. The best 2 scores are saved in the Top Ranking table. Be the best player to enter this Hall of Fame!

There are two different game modes: “classical” and “orientation.” According to the game mode that has been selected, the game’s rules will change slightly. There are many different bonuses that can be collected during the game ! Go Bounce & Break now !
